revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC3200 |revision=A (2.34) |upc= |ean= |asin=B00S9SGNNS |price= |series=AC3200 |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/19/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RT0M00 |ic_id=3568A-RT0M00 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=2.37 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M15F2G16128A-BDB |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM43602 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;SiGe,5003L1;;6; ,,, 3-lane, 3-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8603;;1; |flags= |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Asuswrt-Merlin, FreshTomato-ARM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS,ASUS_5G-1,ASUS_5G-2 |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=AC:9E:17 |oui_eth=AC:9E:17 }}
:• 2x '''1300''' Mbps max PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• 1x '''600''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''3200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Wireless-AC3200 Tri-Band Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC3200/}} {{•}} [http://pcdiy.asus.com/2014/06/rt-ac3200-ultimate-802-11ac-6x6-router-computex-2014/ PR on ''Asus PC DIY''] While not really represented well in the infobox, this is a tri-radio device - all radios
(2x 5GHz [11an+ac], 1x 2.4GHz [11bgn]) used are ('''FullMAC''' arch. targeted) '''BCM43602'''. BCM43602 is supported in the mainline ''Linux'' kernel by [[brcmfmac]]. {{see also|ASUS_RT-AC5300|Arcadyan}} {{WiFiCert|WFA57362|12/04/2014}} ===Specifications=== :per [[ASUS]] [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC3200/ product page] + elsewhere * '''Product class''': ''AC3200'' (600Mbps [2.4GHz] + 2x 1300Mbps [5GHz]) :600Mbps data rates on the 2.4GHz radio require ''TurboQAM'' (256-QAM) * '''Antenna''': 6x external dipole antenna w/ ''RP-SMA'' connector * '''Ports''': Ethernet (10/100/1000 Base-T) : '''WAN''': 1x ''GbE'' (RJ45), '''LAN''': 4x ''GbE'' (RJ45) : '''USB''': 1x ''USB 2.0'', 1x ''USB 3.0'' * '''Vendor firmware features''': ''AiCloud'', USB file/printer/scanner sharing, :''ASUSWRT'' interface, ''Adaptive QoS'', [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32485-asus-rt-ac87u-dual-band-wireless-ac2400-gigabit-router-first-look?start=2 ''AiProtection''], ''Media Station'', :''SmartSync'' (file syncing w/ ''Dropbox'', ''FTP'', [https://www.asuswebstorage.com ''WebStorage''] support), : ''AiRadar'' (beamforming) ===Reviews=== * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32625-asus-rt-ac3200-tri-band-wireless-ac3200-gigabit-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :"RT-AC3200 REV 2.34" is silkscreened on the main board. * [http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/201-asus-rt-ac3200.html On '''FoxNetwork'''] (RU) :"RT-AC3200 REV 4.12", "HannStar KMV-4" and "1513" (04/2015) :is silkscreened on the main board; PSU: 19 V, 2.37/3.42 A * [http://www.cnet.com/products/asus-rt-ac3200-tri-band-wireless-gigabit-router/ On '''C|Net'''] * [http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-ac3200.shtml On '''iXBT'''] (RU) * [https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/asus/asus-rt-ac3200-r196/ On '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) ===Forum threads=== * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/forums/showthread.php?t=18697 ''Share What You Know: ASUS RT-AC3200'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] * [http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?33239-Asus-RT-AC3200-Wireless-Router ''Asus RT-AC3200 Wireless Router'' on '''wl500g.info''' forums] *[http://koolshare.cn/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=2403 ''Asus RT-AC3200 Wireless Router'' on '''KoolShare''' forums] (images PCB) ===News=== * [http://pcdiy.asus.com/2014/06/rt-ac3200-ultimate-802-11ac-6x6-router-computex-2014/ ''RT-AC3200 - 6 Antenna 802.11AC Router - Computex 2014''
on '''Asus PC DYI'''] - (Initial specification dump on 2014-06-02) * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32429-ac3200-routers-by-july ''AC3200 Routers By July?'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32395-ac3200-routers-coming-this-fall ''AC3200 Routers Coming This Fall?'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] * [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s840231 ''Broadcom Doubles Wi-Fi Speed of Devices with First Six Stream
802.11ac MIMO Platform'' on '''Broadcom'''] (press release) :Announces the ''XStream'' platform (which seems to be BCM4709 + 3x BCM43602), :which is touted as ''Penta Core'' (each BCM43602 radio embeds a small processor :to allow for FullMAC operation, BCM4709 remains same dual-core Cortex A9 SoC) * [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4707-4708-4709 ''Broadcom BCM4709 (1GHz dual-core Cortex A9 SoC)'' on '''Product page'''] * [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s817141 ''Broadcom Launches Enhanced 5G WiFi Video Streaming for the Home''
on '''Broadcom'''] (press release) - (Broadcom BCM43602 802.11ac PCIe SoC) * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-features/32451-mu-mimo-vs-xstream-the-coming-battle-for-wi-fi-airtime?showall=&start=1 ''MU-MIMO vs. XStream: The Coming Battle For Wi-Fi Airtime
- Another Approach, The Choice'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :The block diagram shown @ ''SNB'' indicates each BCM43602 includes :its own @ 320MHz ''Cortex R4'' processor (along with 940 KB RAM). * [http://www.revolutionwifi.net/revolutionwifi/2014/04/impact-of-fcc-5-ghz-u-nii-report-order.html ''Impact of the FCC 5 GHz U-NII Report & Order on Wi-Fi Networks''
on '''Revolution Wi-Fi'''] ===See also=== *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[ASUS RT-AC5300]] *[[ASUS RT-AC3200]] *[[ASUS RT-AC3100]] *[[ASUS RT-AC2900]] *[[ASUS RT-AC1900]] ==Images== File:Asus_RT-AC3200_top.jpg|Top File:Asus_RT-AC3200_inside.jpg|Inside File:Asus_RT-AC3200_board.jpg|Board top [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
